title: Tropical Pineapple and Black Bean Salsa
ingredients: ['150g (5 oz) fresh pineapple, finely chopped', '1 red pepper, diced', '1 green pepper, diced', '175g (6 oz) frozen sweetcorn, thawed', '1 (400g) tin black beans, drained and rinsed', '2 spring onions, chopped', '2 green chillies, chopped', '4 tablespoons orange juice', 'handful chopped fresh coriander', '1/2 teaspoon ground cumin', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste']
